definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

sentences.english: Kim tells her that she is on her way and they hang up.
sentences.chinese: 金姆說她就在去反恐組的路上，然後掛斷了電話。

sentences.english: Documents related to the regional anti-terrorism organization will have to be formulated within the framework of the Communiqué.
sentences.chinese: 有關地區反恐怖機構的文件要在公約的框架內製定。

sentences.english: The war demonstrates the duality of the anti-terrorism campaign and the strength of superpowers.
sentences.chinese: 戰爭顯示了超級大國反恐的兩重性及力量的兩重性。

sentences.english: In particular, the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act (FISA) is vital to the community's mission against terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 尤其外國信息監督法案對於智囊團反恐任務至關重要。

sentences.english: Second, step up counter-terrorism efforts and build a safe environment for the Organization’s development.
sentences.chinese: 第二，加大反恐力度，構築本組織發展的安全環境。

sentences.english: Mr Kelly starts every morning with a counter-terrorism briefing.
sentences.chinese: 凱麗先生每個早晨都要參加一場反恐簡報會。

sentences.english: It's for these reasons that the MP5 is the favorite among counter-terrorists and police forces worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 因此MP5受到世界範圍內的反恐和警力部隊的青睞。

sentences.english: Mr. Chambliss often spoke about his efforts as a policy-maker against terrorism .
sentences.chinese: 張伯利斯經常講述他作爲反恐立法委員所做的努力。

sentences.english: CS is a great computer game.
sentences.chinese: 反恐精英是一部很棒的電腦遊戲。

sentences.english: Yemen began cooperating with the United States on counterterrorism activities in late 2001.
sentences.chinese: 從零一年起也門就和美國在反恐行動上進行合作。

sentences.english: And a clutch of counter-terrorism laws that were widely abused under Mr Mubarak will be revoked.
sentences.chinese: 一些在穆巴拉克執政期間廣泛濫用的反恐法也將廢除。

sentences.english: Conforming to this theme, a large number of anti-terrorism films have been made in Hollywood.
sentences.chinese: 好萊塢順應時代主題而拍攝出了一大批反恐影視劇作。

sentences.english: Both heads of state also exchanged views on bilateral cooperation in counter-terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 兩國元首還就中約反恐合作交換了意見。

sentences.english: After the Austria Pama comes on stage, has made the obvious adjustment to the anti-terrorist policy.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬上臺後對反恐政策做出了明顯調整。

sentences.english: The CTU chopper lands to pick up Teri and Kim.
sentences.chinese: 反恐組派來的直升機降落，來接載泰瑞和金姆。

sentences.english: Malaysian anti-terrorism situation is gloomy and doomy and anti-terrorism is an arduous task.
sentences.chinese: 馬來西亞的恐怖主義形勢不容樂觀，反恐任務艱鉅。

definition: Muslim countries/caliphate/Islamic State group (aka IS or ISIL or ISIS)
NATO/abbr. for 北大西洋公約組織|北大西洋公约组织[Bei3 Da4 xi1 Yang2 Gong1 yue1 Zu3 zhi1], North Atlantic Treaty Organization
